original: Yathā ca cāgānussatiyaṁ vuttaṁ yasmiṁ samaye ariyasāvako agāraṁ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgaratoti cāgānussatiyā etaṁ vevacanaṁ.
